title: "dippy the most beautiful thing" sans serif - Gotcha!
content:
It was hard work, but I've finally managed to track down   
the elusive sans serif which had everyone puzzled since   
Jonathan lawley posted [this identification request](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419082442/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/27701.html) more   
than two months ago. It is a face in development by   
Florian Ribisch, a Viennese designer, currently working   
as an art director for the Italian magazine GLAMOUR.   
   
==========   
Hi, my name is Florian Ribisch.   
   
The typeface of the album ["The Eclectic Sound Of Vienna -](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419082442/http:/www.mic.gr/cds.asp?id=25016)   
 [Vol. 5"](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419082442/http:/www.mic.gr/cds.asp?id=25016) is called LABOR and was done by me. [Oliver Kartak](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419082442/http:/www.oliverkartak.com/),   
the designer of the sleeve, did use it exclusively, since the   
font is not 100% ready yet.   
   
Hopefully it will be soon - I'm working on it.   
   
Sincerely, Florian Ribisch
author: Bald Condensed
